widgets.title: Products Not Selling Due to Errors

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $d.message.contains('product') && severity == 'error'
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.kubernetes.node.hostname)
| extract $d.message into $d.product_info using regexp(/.*ID (?<product_id>.*)/)
| join (source product_details_cc) on left=>$d.product_info.product_id == right=>id into enriched_product_data
| choose message, product_info.product_id, enriched_product_data
| groupby 
    product_info.product_id as $d['Product ID'], 
    enriched_product_data.sku as $d['SKU'], 
    enriched_product_data.category as Category, 
    enriched_product_data.product_name as $d['Product Name'] 
agg 
    count() as $d['Failed Purchase Attempts'], 
    `${sum(enriched_product_data.price_in_currency:num)}` as $d['Lost Revenue']
| replace $d['Product ID'] with if($d['Product ID'] == null, 'UNKNOWN', $d['Product ID'])
| replace $d['SKU'] with if($d['SKU'] == null, 'UNKNOWN', $d['SKU'])
| replace $d['Category'] with if($d['Category'] == null, 'UNKNOWN', $d['Category'])
| replace $d['Product Name'] with if($d['Product Name'] == null, 'UNKNOWN', $d['Product Name'])
| replace $d['Lost Revenue'] with if($d['Lost Revenue'] == '$', '$0', $d['Lost Revenue'])
| orderby $d['Lost Revenue'] desc

source logs
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.kubernetes.node.hostname)
| filter product_id_enriched.price_in_currency != null
| groupby true sum(product_id_enriched.price_in_currency:num) as total_revenue
| create rate from total_revenue / $p.timeRange.endTime.diffTime($p.timeRange.startTime).toTimeUnit('m')
| choose rate

source logs
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.kubernetes.node.hostname)
| filter product_id_enriched.price_in_currency != null
| groupby true sum(product_id_enriched.price_in_currency:num) as total_revenue

source spans 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.serviceName == 'frontend'
| groupby true count_if(tags.error == true) as error_count, count() as total_count
| choose (100 - error_count / total_count) as $d['SLA Compliance']

source spans 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.serviceName == 'productcatalogservice'
| groupby true count_if(tags.error == true) as error_count, count() as total_count
| choose (100 - error_count / total_count) as $d['SLA Compliance']
| replace $d['SLA Compliance'] with if($d['SLA Compliance'] == null, 0, $d['SLA Compliance'])

source spans 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.serviceName == 'paymentservice'
| groupby true count_if(tags.error == true) as error_count, count() as total_count
| choose (100 - error_count / total_count) as $d['SLA Compliance']
| replace $d['SLA Compliance'] with if($d['SLA Compliance'] == null, 0, $d['SLA Compliance'])

source spans 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.serviceName == 'frontend'
| groupby true count_if(duration > 500) as slow, count() as total
| choose (100 - (slow / total)) as $d['SLO Compliance']

source spans 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.serviceName == 'paymentservice'
| groupby true count_if(duration > 1000) as slow, count() as total
| choose (100 - (slow / total)) as $d['SLO Compliance']

luceneQuery.value: tags.error: true AND (metadata.subsystemName: *service OR metadata.subsystemName: frontend) AND process.tags.k8s.node.name: ${node}

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.kubernetes.node.hostname)
| filter $m.severity == ERROR 
| groupby $m.timestamp / $p.timeRange.suggestedInterval as timestamp agg count() as count

source spans
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.process.tags['k8s.node.name'])
| filter $l.subsystemName.endsWith('service') || $l.subsystemName == 'frontend'
| groupby $l.subsystemName, $l.operationName agg avg(duration) / 1000 as avg_duration_ms, percentile(0.99, duration) / 1000 as p99_duration_ms
| orderby avg_duration_ms desc

source logs 
| filter $p.node == null || $p.node.arrayContains($d.kubernetes.node.hostname)
| filter severity == 'error' 
| filter $d.message.contains('product')
